      • getEntityValue

        private int getEntityValue(int start)
        Returns the integer associated to the entity stored in the StringBuffer, starting at the passed position (until the end of the buffer).
        Returns:
        -1 if it is not a valid html entity

      • getSubstringUnderHtmlTag

        private java.lang.String getSubstringUnderHtmlTag(java.lang.String s)
        Removes the external tags, if existing. It returns the string contained inside the tags, or null if the tags are not present
